headline: Vertex Pharmaceuticals Stock Is Down 13%. Here's Why You Should Buy the Dip
summary: Vertex Pharmaceuticals (NASDAQ: VRTX) fell by 13% on Dec. 19, when the rare-disease drug developer reported some lackluster results from a late-stage clinical trial.  Vertex is best known for its therapies for the rare lung disease cystic fibrosis (CF).  Its steady work over the year delivered a large market share in CF therapies.
